languages.text: Расчет Лорд-капитана полностью оправдался — отряд с усилиями, но без происшествий преодолел опасный участок. Столь же обнадеживающим оказался и визит в хранилище — оно было заполнено грузом. По довольной улыбке капитана Вести было ясно, что он уверен — это результат его молитвы.

The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.
languages.original_text: Расчет Лорд-капитана полностью оправдался — отряд с усилиями, но без происшествий преодолел опасный участок. Столь же обнадеживающим оказался и визит в хранилище — оно было заполнено грузом. По довольной улыбке капитана Вести было ясно, что он уверен — это результат его молитвы.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

languages.text: La evaluación de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} demostró ser correcta: con dificultad, pero sin tener que lamentar incidencias, la unidad atravesó la zona peligrosa. La visita al depósito fue igualmente fructífera: estaba llena de mercancía. La sonrisa satisfecha del capitán Vesti dejaba claro que atribuía el éxito a sus plegarias.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

traits.locale_text: La evaluación de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} demostró ser correcta: con dificultad, pero sin tener que lamentar incidencias, la unidad atravesó la zona peligrosa. La visita al depósito fue igualmente fructífera: estaba llena de mercancía. La sonrisa satisfecha del capitán Vesti dejaba claro que atribuía el éxito a sus plegarias.

languages.text: 事实证明，舰长大人的判断非常准确。尽管一路上困难重重，但并没有发生任何意外。探索队顺利地穿过了危险区域，最终结果也非常幸运，储藏库内装满了物资。维斯提上尉露出了满意的笑容，似乎是认为这样的结果都要归功于他的祈祷。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

traits.locale_text: 事实证明，舰长大人的判断非常准确。尽管一路上困难重重，但并没有发生任何意外。探索队顺利地穿过了危险区域，最终结果也非常幸运，储藏库内装满了物资。维斯提上尉露出了满意的笑容，似乎是认为这样的结果都要归功于他的祈祷。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの見立ては、完全に正当であると証明された。難しい局面はあったものの、危険な事故は起きず、部隊は危険なセクションを通過した。部隊が倉庫を訪れたのもまた偶然だった。貨物でいっぱいではないか。ヴェスティ中隊長の満足そうな笑みから、祈りのおかげだと思っていることは丸わかりだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの見立ては、完全に正当であると証明された。難しい局面はあったものの、危険な事故は起きず、部隊は危険なセクションを通過した。部隊が倉庫を訪れたのもまた偶然だった。貨物でいっぱいではないか。ヴェスティ中隊長の満足そうな笑みから、祈りのおかげだと思っていることは丸わかりだ。

languages.text: Die Einschätzung des Lord Captain erwies sich als völlig berechtigt – mühsam, aber ohne Zwischenfälle überwand die Einheit den gefährlichen Bereich. Ihr Besuch im Lager war ebenso erfolgreich – es war voller Fracht. Captain Vestis zufriedenes Lächeln zeigte offensichtlich, dass er dieses Ergebnis seinem Gebet zuschrieb.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

traits.locale_text: Die Einschätzung des Lord Captain erwies sich als völlig berechtigt – mühsam, aber ohne Zwischenfälle überwand die Einheit den gefährlichen Bereich. Ihr Besuch im Lager war ebenso erfolgreich – es war voller Fracht. Captain Vestis zufriedenes Lächeln zeigte offensichtlich, dass er dieses Ergebnis seinem Gebet zuschrieb.

languages.text: Les calculs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} se révélèrent corrects : avec peine, mais sans incident, les éclaireurs réussirent à traverser la section dangereuse. Leurs fouilles de l'entrepôt furent elles aussi couronnées de succès, car l'on y trouva du matériel en abondance. Le capitaine Vesti, qui arborait un sourire satisfait, pensait clairement que cet heureux résultat était dû à sa prière.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

traits.locale_text: Les calculs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} se révélèrent corrects : avec peine, mais sans incident, les éclaireurs réussirent à traverser la section dangereuse. Leurs fouilles de l'entrepôt furent elles aussi couronnées de succès, car l'on y trouva du matériel en abondance. Le capitaine Vesti, qui arborait un sourire satisfait, pensait clairement que cet heureux résultat était dû à sa prière.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın değerlendirmesi, bir kez daha haklılığını kanıtlamış oldu. Geç ve güç olmasına rağmen herhangi bir kayıp vermeden tehlikeli bölge aşılmıştı. Depolama birimine yolculukları ise meyvesini vermişti çünkü kargoyla doluydu. Yüzbaşı Vesti'nin sırıtışından tatmin olduğu belliydi, duasının işe yaradığına inanıyordu.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment was proved entirely justified — with difficulty but no adverse incidents, the unit crossed the dangerous section. Their visit to the storage depot was just as fortuitous — it was full of cargo. Captain Vesti's satisfied smile made it clear he believe this result was down to his prayer.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın değerlendirmesi, bir kez daha haklılığını kanıtlamış oldu. Geç ve güç olmasına rağmen herhangi bir kayıp vermeden tehlikeli bölge aşılmıştı. Depolama birimine yolculukları ise meyvesini vermişti çünkü kargoyla doluydu. Yüzbaşı Vesti'nin sırıtışından tatmin olduğu belliydi, duasının işe yaradığına inanıyordu.
